title: Peak Index in a Mountain Array
description: An array arr is a mountain if arr.length >= 3 and there exists some i with 0 < i < arr.length - 1 such that arr[0] < arr[1] < ... < arr[i - 1] < arr[i] and arr[i] > arr[i + 1] > ... > arr[arr.length - 1]. Given a mountain array arr, return the index i such that arr[0] < arr[1] < ... < arr[i - 1] < arr[i] and arr[i] > arr[i + 1] > ... > arr[arr.length - 1].
input_format: Elements of the array separated by space.
